about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION

A dad is only as respected as his authority over his thermostat. One does not simply touch the thermostat without the proper ceremony of sacrifice. One taco, one dad joke, and a child to hear his chants with the enthusiasm of a 10,000 heavy metal head bangers at an ACDC concert, or in modern times, the will of 1 child reverberating screams of "Skibidi!" and saying, "You have Ohio Rizz!".

I digress. THIS......this is the story of someone or something that refused to accept these terms of agreement. Now! One dad must travel across the lands, searching for the thing.....that touched his thermostat! - Cut to the montage!!!!

Oh! and did I mention there's questions!???? How does this apply to the story???? YES! Now, good luck on your quest, but most importantly, have a good day!

ENEMY SKILL SYSTEM

The uniqueness of this game comes from the fact that you are not only answering questions but also trying to counter enemy attacks. Various special effects will challenge your ability to answer questions. You will have to master your skills and use them at the correct time to defeat these tough enemies!

ABOUT DEVELOPER

This game was developed, "of the dad, by the dad, for the dad, so we do not perish" - Some Dad. Seriously though, this idea started one summer vacation with the kids. As a life long gamer, I wanted to make something that would accomplish my long awaited goal of being a game developer. I know my children will follow suit in the same path and wanted to create something with them in mind. Both my wife and kids and many friends have helped me with this project. I am blessed to have them in my life.

name: RPG Quiz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 177 MB available space

short_description: It's a quiz game with RPG/Roguelike aspects. Enemies can blind, stun and even confuse you using your own tactics against you! You will be answering randomly selected questions, defeating each foe and learning class skills along the way!
